data.title: Warm, friendly and excellent food
data.text:
On a recent whirlwind trip to Conway, AR we needed a quick and decent dinner late Sunday evening. Mike's was recommended by the front desk clerk at our hotel and we could not have been more pleased!
Excellent food, decent wine list, and outstanding service. Nice atmosphere, too. 
Highly recommend!

data.title: good Service, Very Good Meal
data.text:
Ate there Thursday night, good crowd. Seated promptly, server was there quickly, offer a couple of suggestions. 
I had a Caesar Salad and the Penna Pasta dish, Salad was great, had to ask for ground pepper, wasn't offered. 
Penna Pasta dish was very good
Don't know why the didn't have Sweet and Low, just a personal thing

data.title: A Culineary Delight in a Town Used to Fried Catfish
data.text: Great atmosphere with gas lights, art-lined brick walls, and attentive service. The bar is stocked with the best liquors and several of the friendliest bartenders in Arkansas. The hamburgers and steaks are cooked to how you want them; the seafood is fresh and cooked to the style you want them; the salads and soups (including good Louisiana gumbo) will fill you up on their own. It is a place that will not disappoint!

data.title: Great steaks...and great Gumbo
data.text: Popped in here for dinner when a colleague visited from out of town. We were both in the mood for steak AND cajun food. So Mike's won the draw. Ordered a medium rare ribeye and a cup of Gumbo and both were fabulous. Had desert to cap ot pff, bit honestly, I can't remember what it was. But I remember the gumbo...and that steak is still sizzling in my memory!

data.title: Great service excellent food
data.text: Seated immediately and soon welcomed by a waiter, who was friendly, helpful,and attentive throughout meal. Entre was pecan crusted grouper with a raspberry sauce. Fish was properly cooked, crust crispy, and sauce paired well with fish. Excellent dish and well prepared. Other members of party had steak and prime rib and thought it was wonderful. Their salads were crisp and delicious. Appetizer and deserts also excellent. Highly recommend Mike's and would definitely eat here again.

data.title: Always a great meal and service
data.text: Mike's Place does not disappoint! We enjoy to atmosphere, drinks, and food every time we visit with friends or work colleagues. If you are looking for some great food and great service then you cannot go wrong with Mike's Place!

data.title: Let's Talk about the Rolls
data.text:
Mike's Place is probably the finest dining in Conway. It is locally owned and serves up some tasty New Orleans style food. Mike himself is well known in Conway for opening the first restaurant in a "dry county" serving with a liquor license. Finally we have dinner and wine. He deserves 5 stars for that alone! Later, several other restaurants obtained liqour licenses but he was the front-runner. When we have guests visiting-we take them to Mike's Place.
The food is great and the service even better. This is a college town with 3 Universities so please help the staff get through school with generous tips. They do a great job and deserve every dime you leave.
You can even spot Mike here most of the time. Look for the physically fit gentleman who never lost his high school physique and has a black patch over his left eye (never asked-he never told)
Lets talk about the dinner rolls. Ok folks this is fine dining in Conway. But the rolls came out of some frozen roll pkg. No, frozen rolls are better. I just don't get it. So don't get your hopes up when the basket of rolls comes. Prepare yourself for whats left to come because it gets much better!

 Thus the 4 stars for otherwise a perfect dining experience. A must do while in Conway. Don't leave Conway without a visit here

data.title: Terrible food and service
data.text: My wife and I were passing through and saw this place was highly rated on google and yelp. We were really disappointed. They stuck us in a room by ourselves and we both ordered a side salad which was very good but it went downhill from there. We both ordered the chicken tresor plus I ordered crab cakes.The menu said the chicken was infused with bab sauce but it was just drenched with sauce on top with cheese and bacon on top . It took a very long time to get our food and then the broccoli was cold the chicken very dry and the wife's baked potato was cold. Crab cakes were ok. I definitely would not eat here again or recommend it to anyone.

data.title: My special place
data.text: When Ever And the servers make you feel right at home. I have tried a number of their specialties and they've all been very good.

data.title: Yummy
data.text: Went to Mike's after a day of sight seeing in Little Rock.  Excellent meal quick and good.  Lots of parking, and easy to find.

data.title: Excellent service
data.text: Mike's Place was wonderful.  Had a variety from which to choose.  The only problem was too many from which to choose.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Very nice elegant restaurant. Customer service is great and food is fabulous. I highly recommend this restaurant in Conway Ar

data.title: Love this place
data.text: We go here regularly and really enjoy the food. The seafood crepes are amazing and the ribs are really good too. It's always clean and the staff is always friendly. The desserts are homemade and run out so go early in the week if you want that. Drew is the best bartender in town!

data.title: Drinks and Dinner
data.text: Great atmosphere! Great place to meet, have a drink or two, and have dinner!  The restaurant and bar are a low light area consisting of tables and booths. The service and staff were great. The owner, Mike Coats stopped by the table and visited a few minutes. They were very busy the Friday evening we went, but we didn't mind having a drink and visiting while we waited. Overall, we will be going back as regulars.

data.title: Amazing
data.text: This place is amazing with absolutely amazing food. It's higher in food with still a moderate price. All of their seafood is excellent and I have never had a bad meal at this restaurant. The staff is very friendly and the servers are pretty amazing as well.

data.title: Top local spot in Conway
data.text: Always great food and service. This is where the locals go for special occasions. In downtown Conway.

data.title: Impressive Dining at Mike's
data.text: We were out-of-staters visiting relative in Conway and were treated do dinner at this upscale, yet casual, restaurant.  It was a great experience and most enjoyable! Exactly at the appointed time of our reservation we were shown to our table and, within a minute or two, were greeted by our waitress.  She offered suggestions, gave helpful description and was extremely friendly and efficient.  Refills of all of our drinks were never lacking, and the service was superb.  Each of our entrees was nicely presented, well-prepared and delicious.  Mike's has a well-deserved reputation.We hope to return on our next visit to Conway.

data.title: "Great Shrimp!"
data.text: We were traveling through Conway and stopped to eat dinner at Mike's Place.  Taylor was our waiter....what a fabulous waiter he was!  The fried shrimp was ever bit as good; not to mention, the wine!  The manager even came over and visited with us.  We would definitely return!

data.title: WONDERFUL Restaurant!
data.text: If you get a chance to eat here, do so, it is the best!  This is and has been my very favorite restaurant in Conway for as long as it's been there.  Elegant, relaxing dining with beyond excellent food.  I've never had a dish I did not truly enjoy whether at lunch or for dinner.

data.title: Unbelievable experience!
data.text: Mike's is casual and elegant.   My family loves this place. Food is always extraordinary.   The owner is often seen greeting and visiting with patrons.  He wants to be sure you're fully satisfied.   The staff is extremely attentive and you will feel pampered.    Honestly, don't miss it!
